author: mrmitch
title: Fun to play if you can keep ball on the field
review: I know football (soccer) is huge in Europe and thats why LEGO came out with this theme. The game itself can be fun but you need two people with quick reflexs to really get a game going. Easy to build, pleanty of mini figs. and when I came across it I got it for 60% off which to me was a selling point.

author: legojoe6678
title: GREAT!
review:
I have this set and its awesome! 

  Pros- EVERYTHING.

 Cons- The spring will wear off
           and kick weakly, but it
           wears off in two years so
           its still good.

       I recommend this set to ANY sports
         and soccer fans. It's simply. Amazing!
